org.bladerunnerjs.plugin.base

Class AbstractContentPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bladerunnerjs.plugin.base.AbstractPlugin
      • org.bladerunnerjs.plugin.base.AbstractContentPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentPlugin, OrderedPlugin, Plugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AliasingContentPlugin, AppMetadataContentPlugin, CommonJsContentPlugin, CompositeJsContentPlugin, CssContentPlugin, CssResourceContentPlugin, HTMLContentPlugin, I18nContentPlugin, NamespacedJsContentPlugin, ThirdpartyContentPlugin, UnbundledResourcesContentPlugin, XMLContentPlugin

    public abstract class AbstractContentPlugin
extends AbstractPlugin
implements ContentPlugin
    A specialization of AbstractPlugin for developers that need to implement ContentPlugin.
